nodes.bodyText: @Vatavuk that's not storage, these are just settings Storage is built from. I think that comment we have now is correct
@olegmoz we are not building settings from YAML. We are taking YAML settings and build Storage.
@olegmoz this class is actually not settings, it represent storage. Can we rename it to YamlStorage or YamlStorageFrom
@Vatavuk I'd prefer existing name, YamlStorage and YamlStorageFrom sound like Storage implementations
@olegmoz ideally it should be Storage implementation. This class basically takes settings and builds Storage object. This class should represent Storage built from settings not other way around.
@Vatavuk I am not sure that it would be better design, so I'd prefer to keep the classes as they are
@g4s8 I don't agree with @olegmoz but if you do we can merge, it's not a big issue.
